cn.org.bjca.footstone.gateway.dao.mapper.ApiVersionJoinInfoMapperCustom.selectByCriteria

/Users/liujinliang/workspace/project/api-gateway-manager/api-gateway-manager-server/src/main/resources/mapping/ApiVersionJoinInfoMapperCustom.xml:6
ä¸¥é‡ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™©
SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™© - æ£€æµ‹åˆ° ${api_version_ids} å ä½ç¬¦

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

List selectByCriteria(Map criteria)

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<select id="selectByCriteria" parameterType="java.util.Map" resultType="ApiVersionJoinInfoCustom"> SELECT base.id, base.api_id, base.name, base.group_id, base.group_name, base.developer_id, base.group_description, base.version, base.is_audit, base.status, base.provider_type, base.outer_url, base.test_url, base.pre_url, base.product_url, base.sandbox_url, base.cookies, base.creator, base.modifier, base.create_time, base.update_time, IFNULL(audit.auditor, '') AS auditor, IFNULL(audit.create_time, 0) AS audit_create_time, IFNULL(audit.update_time, 0) AS audit_update_time FROM (SELECT api_version.id, api_version.api_id, api.name, api_group.group_id, api_group.group_name, api_group.developer_id, api_group.group_description, api_version.version, api_version.is_audit, api_version.status, api_version.provider_type, api_version.outer_url, api_version.test_url, api_version.pre_url, api_version.product_url, api_version.sandbox_url, api_version.cookies, api_version.creator, api_version.modifier, api_version.create_time, api_version.update_time FROM api_version, api, api_group WHERE api_version.api_id = api.id <if test="creator != null and creator != ''"> AND api_version.creator LIKE CONCAT('%', #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') </if> <if test="outer_url != null and outer_url != ''"> AND api_version.outer_url LIKE CONCAT('%', #{outer_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') </if> <if test="name != null and name != ''"> AND api.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') </if> <if test="group_id != null and group_id &gt; 0"> AND api_group.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} </if> <if test="api_version_ids != null and api_version_ids != ''"> AND api_version.id IN ( ${api_version_ids} ) </if> AND api.category_id = api_group.group_id AND is_deleted = 0 AND api.id IN (SELECT api.id FROM api WHERE api.developer_id = #{developer_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT api.id FROM api_group_whitelist LEFT JOIN api ON api.category_id = api_group_whitelist.group_id WHERE api_group_whitelist.developer_id = #{developer_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT api_whitelist.api_id FROM api_whitelist WHERE api_whitelist.developer_id = #{developer_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ORDER BY api_group.group_id , api_version.id ) AS base LEFT JOIN api_version_appendix_audit AS audit ON base.id = audit.id </select>
ğŸ’¡ å»ºè®®ï¼š ã€IN å­å¥åŠ¨æ€å€¼ã€‘ é—®é¢˜ï¼šIN (${ids}) å­˜åœ¨ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™© æ­£ç¡®æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼šä½¿ç”¨ <foreach> æ ‡ç­¾ ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š<foreach collection="ids" item="id" open="(" close=")" separator=","> #{id} </foreach> æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿™æ ·æ¯ä¸ªå€¼éƒ½ä¼šè¢«å‚æ•°åŒ–ï¼Œå®‰å…¨ä¸”é«˜æ•ˆ

cn.org.bjca.footstone.gateway.dao.mapper.ApiVersionJoinInfoMapperCustom.selectByGroupIds

/Users/liujinliang/workspace/project/api-gateway-manager/api-gateway-manager-server/src/main/resources/mapping/ApiVersionJoinInfoMapperCustom.xml:132
ä¸¥é‡ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™©
SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™© - æ£€æµ‹åˆ° ${groupIds} å ä½ç¬¦

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

List selectByGroupIds(String groupIds)

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<select id="selectByGroupIds" resultType="cn.org.bjca.footstone.gateway.dao.model.ApiVersionJoinInfoCustom"> SELECT base.id, base.api_id, api.name, api_group.group_id, api_group.group_name, api_group.developer_id, api_group.group_description, base.version, base.is_audit, base.status, base.provider_type, base.outer_url, base.test_url, base.pre_url, base.product_url, base.sandbox_url, base.cookies, base.creator, base.modifier, base.create_time, base.update_time, IFNULL(audit.auditor, '') AS auditor, IFNULL(audit.create_time, 0) AS audit_create_time, IFNULL(audit.update_time, 0) AS audit_update_time FROM api_version as base left join api on base.api_id = api.id left join api_group on api.category_id = api_group.group_id left join api_version_appendix_audit AS audit ON base.id = audit.id WHERE base.is_deleted = 0 AND api_group.group_id in (${groupIds}) </select>
ğŸ’¡ å»ºè®®ï¼š ã€IN å­å¥åŠ¨æ€å€¼ã€‘ é—®é¢˜ï¼šIN (${ids}) å­˜åœ¨ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™© æ­£ç¡®æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼šä½¿ç”¨ <foreach> æ ‡ç­¾ ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š<foreach collection="ids" item="id" open="(" close=")" separator=","> #{id} </foreach> æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿™æ ·æ¯ä¸ªå€¼éƒ½ä¼šè¢«å‚æ•°åŒ–ï¼Œå®‰å…¨ä¸”é«˜æ•ˆ

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

é«˜å± åˆ†é¡µé—®é¢˜
SELECT æŸ¥è¯¢ç¼ºå°‘ç‰©ç†åˆ†é¡µ - å¤§æ•°æ®é‡æ—¶å¯èƒ½å¯¼è‡´å†…å­˜æº¢å‡ºï¼ˆé€»è¾‘åˆ†é¡µé£é™©ï¼‰

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

List getApiVersionIdsByUserName(String userName)

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<select id="getApiVersionIdsByUserName" resultType="java.lang.Integer"> SELECT DISTINCT v.id as api_version_id from api_version as v inner join alarm_api_rule as a where v.creator like CONCAT('', #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%%') and (a.status = 1 or a.status = 2) and v.is_deleted = 0 </select>
ğŸ’¡ å»ºè®®ï¼š å»ºè®®ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ç‰©ç†åˆ†é¡µæœºåˆ¶ - LIMIT å­å¥ã€RowBounds å‚æ•°ã€PageHelper æˆ– MyBatis-Plus çš„ IPage/Page

cn.org.bjca.footstone.gateway.dao.mapper.ApiVersionMapperCustom.getApiOwnerStats

/Users/liujinliang/workspace/project/api-gateway-manager/api-gateway-manager-server/src/main/resources/mapping/ApiVersionMapperCustom.xml:850
é«˜å± åˆ†é¡µé—®é¢˜
SELECT æŸ¥è¯¢ç¼ºå°‘ç‰©ç†åˆ†é¡µ - å¤§æ•°æ®é‡æ—¶å¯èƒ½å¯¼è‡´å†…å­˜æº¢å‡ºï¼ˆé€»è¾‘åˆ†é¡µé£é™©ï¼‰

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

List getApiOwnerStats()

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<select id="getApiOwnerStats" resultMap="OwnerStatsResultMap"> <![CDATA[ select tmp.creator_trim, tmp.status, tmp.status_count, ifnull(user.user_id, 0) as user_id from ( select trim(trailing ";" from creator) as creator_trim, status, count(1) as status_count from api_version where is_deleted = 0 group by trim(";" from creator), status ) as tmp left join user on tmp.creator_trim = user.rtx ]]> </select>
ğŸ’¡ å»ºè®®ï¼š å»ºè®®ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ç‰©ç†åˆ†é¡µæœºåˆ¶ - LIMIT å­å¥ã€RowBounds å‚æ•°ã€PageHelper æˆ– MyBatis-Plus çš„ IPage/Page

cn.org.bjca.footstone.gateway.dao.mapper.ApiVersionJoinInfoMapperCustom.selectByCriteria

/Users/liujinliang/workspace/project/api-gateway-manager/api-gateway-manager-server/src/main/resources/mapping/ApiVersionJoinInfoMapperCustom.xml:6
ä¸¥é‡ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™©
SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™© - æ£€æµ‹åˆ° ${api_version_ids} å ä½ç¬¦

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

List selectByCriteria(Map criteria)

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<select id="selectByCriteria" parameterType="java.util.Map" resultType="ApiVersionJoinInfoCustom"> SELECT base.id, base.api_id, base.name, base.group_id, base.group_name, base.developer_id, base.group_description, base.version, base.is_audit, base.status, base.provider_type, base.outer_url, base.test_url, base.pre_url, base.product_url, base.sandbox_url, base.cookies, base.creator, base.modifier, base.create_time, base.update_time, IFNULL(audit.auditor, '') AS auditor, IFNULL(audit.create_time, 0) AS audit_create_time, IFNULL(audit.update_time, 0) AS audit_update_time FROM (SELECT api_version.id, api_version.api_id, api.name, api_group.group_id, api_group.group_name, api_group.developer_id, api_group.group_description, api_version.version, api_version.is_audit, api_version.status, api_version.provider_type, api_version.outer_url, api_version.test_url, api_version.pre_url, api_version.product_url, api_version.sandbox_url, api_version.cookies, api_version.creator, api_version.modifier, api_version.create_time, api_version.update_time FROM api_version, api, api_group WHERE api_version.api_id = api.id <if test="creator != null and creator != ''"> AND api_version.creator LIKE CONCAT('%', #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') </if> <if test="outer_url != null and outer_url != ''"> AND api_version.outer_url LIKE CONCAT('%', #{outer_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') </if> <if test="name != null and name != ''"> AND api.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') </if> <if test="group_id != null and group_id &gt; 0"> AND api_group.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} </if> <if test="api_version_ids != null and api_version_ids != ''"> AND api_version.id IN ( ${api_version_ids} ) </if> AND api.category_id = api_group.group_id AND is_deleted = 0 AND api.id IN (SELECT api.id FROM api WHERE api.developer_id = #{developer_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT api.id FROM api_group_whitelist LEFT JOIN api ON api.category_id = api_group_whitelist.group_id WHERE api_group_whitelist.developer_id = #{developer_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT api_whitelist.api_id FROM api_whitelist WHERE api_whitelist.developer_id = #{developer_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ORDER BY api_group.group_id , api_version.id ) AS base LEFT JOIN api_version_appendix_audit AS audit ON base.id = audit.id </select>
ğŸ’¡ å»ºè®®ï¼š ã€IN å­å¥åŠ¨æ€å€¼ã€‘ é—®é¢˜ï¼šIN (${ids}) å­˜åœ¨ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™© æ­£ç¡®æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼šä½¿ç”¨ <foreach> æ ‡ç­¾ ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š<foreach collection="ids" item="id" open="(" close=")" separator=","> #{id} </foreach> æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿™æ ·æ¯ä¸ªå€¼éƒ½ä¼šè¢«å‚æ•°åŒ–ï¼Œå®‰å…¨ä¸”é«˜æ•ˆ

cn.org.bjca.footstone.gateway.dao.mapper.ApiVersionJoinInfoMapperCustom.selectByGroupIds

/Users/liujinliang/workspace/project/api-gateway-manager/api-gateway-manager-server/src/main/resources/mapping/ApiVersionJoinInfoMapperCustom.xml:132
ä¸¥é‡ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™©
SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™© - æ£€æµ‹åˆ° ${groupIds} å ä½ç¬¦

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

List selectByGroupIds(String groupIds)

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<select id="selectByGroupIds" resultType="cn.org.bjca.footstone.gateway.dao.model.ApiVersionJoinInfoCustom"> SELECT base.id, base.api_id, api.name, api_group.group_id, api_group.group_name, api_group.developer_id, api_group.group_description, base.version, base.is_audit, base.status, base.provider_type, base.outer_url, base.test_url, base.pre_url, base.product_url, base.sandbox_url, base.cookies, base.creator, base.modifier, base.create_time, base.update_time, IFNULL(audit.auditor, '') AS auditor, IFNULL(audit.create_time, 0) AS audit_create_time, IFNULL(audit.update_time, 0) AS audit_update_time FROM api_version as base left join api on base.api_id = api.id left join api_group on api.category_id = api_group.group_id left join api_version_appendix_audit AS audit ON base.id = audit.id WHERE base.is_deleted = 0 AND api_group.group_id in (${groupIds}) </select>
ğŸ’¡ å»ºè®®ï¼š ã€IN å­å¥åŠ¨æ€å€¼ã€‘ é—®é¢˜ï¼šIN (${ids}) å­˜åœ¨ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™© æ­£ç¡®æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼šä½¿ç”¨ <foreach> æ ‡ç­¾ ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š<foreach collection="ids" item="id" open="(" close=")" separator=","> #{id} </foreach> æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿™æ ·æ¯ä¸ªå€¼éƒ½ä¼šè¢«å‚æ•°åŒ–ï¼Œå®‰å…¨ä¸”é«˜æ•ˆ

/Users/liujinliang/workspace/project/api-gateway-manager/api-gateway-manager-server/src/main/resources/mapping/ApiVersionMapper.xml:979
ä¸¥é‡ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™©

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

int updateByExampleSelective(ApiVersionWithBLOBs record, ApiVersionExample example)

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<update id="updateByExampleSelective" parameterType="map"> update api_version <set> <if test="record.id != null"> id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, </if> <if test="record.apiId != null"> api_id = ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

é«˜å± åˆ†é¡µé—®é¢˜
SELECT æŸ¥è¯¢ç¼ºå°‘ç‰©ç†åˆ†é¡µ - å¤§æ•°æ®é‡æ—¶å¯èƒ½å¯¼è‡´å†…å­˜æº¢å‡ºï¼ˆé€»è¾‘åˆ†é¡µé£é™©ï¼‰

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

List getApiOperRecordDTData(Integer beginTime, Integer endTime, int iIndex, int iLen)

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<select id="getApiOperRecordDTData" resultMap="dtDataResultMap"> select operdate, count(oper_type) as oper_type_count, oper_type from ( select substring(opertimestr, #{iIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{iLen,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) as operdate , oper_type from api_oper_info where opertime &lt;= #{endTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} and opertime &gt;=#{beginTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}) tt group by operdate, oper_type; </select>
ğŸ’¡ å»ºè®®ï¼š å»ºè®®ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ç‰©ç†åˆ†é¡µæœºåˆ¶ - LIMIT å­å¥ã€RowBounds å‚æ•°ã€PageHelper æˆ– MyBatis-Plus çš„ IPage/Page

List getApiVersionIdsByUserName(String userName)

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<select id="getApiVersionIdsByUserName" resultType="java.lang.Integer"> SELECT DISTINCT v.id as api_version_id from api_version as v inner join alarm_api_rule as a where v.creator like CONCAT('', #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%%') and (a.status = 1 or a.status = 2) and v.is_deleted = 0 </select>

é«˜å± åˆ†é¡µé—®é¢˜

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

List getApiOwnerStats()

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<select id="getApiOwnerStats" resultMap="OwnerStatsResultMap"> <![CDATA[ select tmp.creator_trim, tmp.status, tmp.status_count, ifnull(user.user_id, 0) as user_id from ( select trim(trailing ";" from creator) as creator_trim, status, count(1) as status_count from api_version where is_deleted = 0 group by trim(";" from creator), status ) as tmp left join user on tmp.creator_trim = user.rtx ]]> </select>

List selectByCriteria(Map criteria)

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<select id="selectByCriteria" parameterType="java.util.Map" resultType="ApiVersionJoinInfoCustom"> SELECT base.id, base.api_id, base.name, base.group_id, base.group_name, base.developer_id, base.group_description, base.version, base.is_audit, base.status, base.provider_type, base.outer_url, base.test_url, base.pre_url, base.product_url, base.sandbox_url, base.cookies, base.creator, base.modifier, base.create_time, base.update_time, IFNULL(audit.auditor, '') AS auditor, IFNULL(audit.create_time, 0) AS audit_create_time, IFNULL(audit.update_time, 0) AS audit_update_time FROM (SELECT api_version.id, api_version.api_id, api.name, api_group.group_id, api_group.group_name, api_group.developer_id, api_group.group_description, api_version.version, api_version.is_audit, api_version.status, api_version.provider_type, api_version.outer_url, api_version.test_url, api_version.pre_url, api_version.product_url, api_version.sandbox_url, api_version.cookies, api_version.creator, api_version.modifier, api_version.create_time, api_version.update_time FROM api_version, api, api_group WHERE api_version.api_id = api.id <if test="creator != null and creator != ''"> AND api_version.creator LIKE CONCAT('%', #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') </if> <if test="outer_url != null and outer_url != ''"> AND api_version.outer_url LIKE CONCAT('%', #{outer_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') </if> <if test="name != null and name != ''"> AND api.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') </if> <if test="group_id != null and group_id &gt; 0"> AND api_group.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} </if> <if test="api_version_ids != null and api_version_ids != ''"> AND api_version.id IN ( ${api_version_ids} ) </if> AND api.category_id = api_group.group_id AND is_deleted = 0 AND api.id IN (SELECT api.id FROM api WHERE api.developer_id = #{developer_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT api.id FROM api_group_whitelist LEFT JOIN api ON api.category_id = api_group_whitelist.group_id WHERE api_group_whitelist.developer_id = #{developer_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT api_whitelist.api_id FROM api_whitelist WHERE api_whitelist.developer_id = #{developer_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ORDER BY api_group.group_id , api_version.id ) AS base LEFT JOIN api_version_appendix_audit AS audit ON base.id = audit.id </select>
ğŸ’¡ å»ºè®®ï¼š ã€IN å­å¥åŠ¨æ€å€¼ã€‘ é—®é¢˜ï¼šIN (${ids}) å­˜åœ¨ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™© æ­£ç¡®æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼šä½¿ç”¨ <foreach> æ ‡ç­¾ ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š<foreach collection="ids" item="id" open="(" close=")" separator=","> #{id} </foreach> æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿™æ ·æ¯ä¸ªå€¼éƒ½ä¼šè¢«å‚æ•°åŒ–ï¼Œå®‰å…¨ä¸”é«˜æ•ˆ

cn.org.bjca.footstone.gateway.dao.mapper.ApiVersionJoinInfoMapperCustom.selectByGroupIds

/Users/liujinliang/workspace/project/api-gateway-manager/api-gateway-manager-server/src/main/resources/mapping/ApiVersionJoinInfoMapperCustom.xml:132
ä¸¥é‡ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™©
SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™© - æ£€æµ‹åˆ° ${groupIds} å ä½ç¬¦

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

List selectByGroupIds(String groupIds)

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<select id="selectByGroupIds" resultType="cn.org.bjca.footstone.gateway.dao.model.ApiVersionJoinInfoCustom"> SELECT base.id, base.api_id, api.name, api_group.group_id, api_group.group_name, api_group.developer_id, api_group.group_description, base.version, base.is_audit, base.status, base.provider_type, base.outer_url, base.test_url, base.pre_url, base.product_url, base.sandbox_url, base.cookies, base.creator, base.modifier, base.create_time, base.update_time, IFNULL(audit.auditor, '') AS auditor, IFNULL(audit.create_time, 0) AS audit_create_time, IFNULL(audit.update_time, 0) AS audit_update_time FROM api_version as base left join api on base.api_id = api.id left join api_group on api.category_id = api_group.group_id left join api_version_appendix_audit AS audit ON base.id = audit.id WHERE base.is_deleted = 0 AND api_group.group_id in (${groupIds}) </select>
ğŸ’¡ å»ºè®®ï¼š ã€IN å­å¥åŠ¨æ€å€¼ã€‘ é—®é¢˜ï¼šIN (${ids}) å­˜åœ¨ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™© æ­£ç¡®æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼šä½¿ç”¨ <foreach> æ ‡ç­¾ ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š<foreach collection="ids" item="id" open="(" close=")" separator=","> #{id} </foreach> æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿™æ ·æ¯ä¸ªå€¼éƒ½ä¼šè¢«å‚æ•°åŒ–ï¼Œå®‰å…¨ä¸”é«˜æ•ˆ

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

ğŸ’¡ å»ºè®®ï¼š ã€UPDATE åŠ¨æ€ SQLã€‘ é—®é¢˜ï¼šç›´æ¥æ‹¼æ¥ SQL ç‰‡æ®µå­˜åœ¨æ³¨å…¥é£é™© æ–¹æ¡ˆ1ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ <set> + <if> æ ‡ç­¾å•ç‹¬å¤„ç†æ¯ä¸ªå­—æ®µ æ–¹æ¡ˆ2ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ updateByPrimaryKeySelective() æ–¹æ³• æ–¹æ¡ˆ3ï¼šä¸šåŠ¡å±‚ç™½åå•éªŒè¯å…è®¸çš„å­—æ®µå
åˆ†é¡µé—®é¢˜ 16 ä¸ª

List getApiOperRecordNum(Integer begin, Integer end)

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

é«˜å± åˆ†é¡µé—®é¢˜
SELECT æŸ¥è¯¢ç¼ºå°‘ç‰©ç†åˆ†é¡µ - å¤§æ•°æ®é‡æ—¶å¯èƒ½å¯¼è‡´å†…å­˜æº¢å‡ºï¼ˆé€»è¾‘åˆ†é¡µé£é™©ï¼‰

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

List getApiVersionIdsByUserName(String userName)

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<select id="getApiVersionIdsByUserName" resultType="java.lang.Integer"> SELECT DISTINCT v.id as api_version_id from api_version as v inner join alarm_api_rule as a where v.creator like CONCAT('', #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%%') and (a.status = 1 or a.status = 2) and v.is_deleted = 0 </select>

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

int updateByExampleSelective(User record, UserExample example)

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

ApiVersionJoinInfoMapperCustom.xml 2 ä¸ª

cn.org.bjca.footstone.gateway.dao.mapper.ApiVersionJoinInfoMapperCustom.selectByCriteria

/Users/liujinliang/workspace/project/api-gateway-manager/api-gateway-manager-server/src/main/resources/mapping/ApiVersionJoinInfoMapperCustom.xml:6
ä¸¥é‡ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™©
SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™© - æ£€æµ‹åˆ° ${api_version_ids} å ä½ç¬¦

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

List selectByCriteria(Map criteria)

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<select id="selectByCriteria" parameterType="java.util.Map" resultType="ApiVersionJoinInfoCustom"> SELECT base.id, base.api_id, base.name, base.group_id, base.group_name, base.developer_id, base.group_description, base.version, base.is_audit, base.status, base.provider_type, base.outer_url, base.test_url, base.pre_url, base.product_url, base.sandbox_url, base.cookies, base.creator, base.modifier, base.create_time, base.update_time, IFNULL(audit.auditor, '') AS auditor, IFNULL(audit.create_time, 0) AS audit_create_time, IFNULL(audit.update_time, 0) AS audit_update_time FROM (SELECT api_version.id, api_version.api_id, api.name, api_group.group_id, api_group.group_name, api_group.developer_id, api_group.group_description, api_version.version, api_version.is_audit, api_version.status, api_version.provider_type, api_version.outer_url, api_version.test_url, api_version.pre_url, api_version.product_url, api_version.sandbox_url, api_version.cookies, api_version.creator, api_version.modifier, api_version.create_time, api_version.update_time FROM api_version, api, api_group WHERE api_version.api_id = api.id <if test="creator != null and creator != ''"> AND api_version.creator LIKE CONCAT('%', #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') </if> <if test="outer_url != null and outer_url != ''"> AND api_version.outer_url LIKE CONCAT('%', #{outer_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') </if> <if test="name != null and name != ''"> AND api.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') </if> <if test="group_id != null and group_id &gt; 0"> AND api_group.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} </if> <if test="api_version_ids != null and api_version_ids != ''"> AND api_version.id IN ( ${api_version_ids} ) </if> AND api.category_id = api_group.group_id AND is_deleted = 0 AND api.id IN (SELECT api.id FROM api WHERE api.developer_id = #{developer_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT api.id FROM api_group_whitelist LEFT JOIN api ON api.category_id = api_group_whitelist.group_id WHERE api_group_whitelist.developer_id = #{developer_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT api_whitelist.api_id FROM api_whitelist WHERE api_whitelist.developer_id = #{developer_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ORDER BY api_group.group_id , api_version.id ) AS base LEFT JOIN api_version_appendix_audit AS audit ON base.id = audit.id </select>
ğŸ’¡ å»ºè®®ï¼š ã€IN å­å¥åŠ¨æ€å€¼ã€‘ é—®é¢˜ï¼šIN (${ids}) å­˜åœ¨ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™© æ­£ç¡®æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼šä½¿ç”¨ <foreach> æ ‡ç­¾ ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š<foreach collection="ids" item="id" open="(" close=")" separator=","> #{id} </foreach> æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿™æ ·æ¯ä¸ªå€¼éƒ½ä¼šè¢«å‚æ•°åŒ–ï¼Œå®‰å…¨ä¸”é«˜æ•ˆ

cn.org.bjca.footstone.gateway.dao.mapper.ApiVersionJoinInfoMapperCustom.selectByGroupIds

/Users/liujinliang/workspace/project/api-gateway-manager/api-gateway-manager-server/src/main/resources/mapping/ApiVersionJoinInfoMapperCustom.xml:132
ä¸¥é‡ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™©
SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™© - æ£€æµ‹åˆ° ${groupIds} å ä½ç¬¦

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

List selectByGroupIds(String groupIds)

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<select id="selectByGroupIds" resultType="cn.org.bjca.footstone.gateway.dao.model.ApiVersionJoinInfoCustom"> SELECT base.id, base.api_id, api.name, api_group.group_id, api_group.group_name, api_group.developer_id, api_group.group_description, base.version, base.is_audit, base.status, base.provider_type, base.outer_url, base.test_url, base.pre_url, base.product_url, base.sandbox_url, base.cookies, base.creator, base.modifier, base.create_time, base.update_time, IFNULL(audit.auditor, '') AS auditor, IFNULL(audit.create_time, 0) AS audit_create_time, IFNULL(audit.update_time, 0) AS audit_update_time FROM api_version as base left join api on base.api_id = api.id left join api_group on api.category_id = api_group.group_id left join api_version_appendix_audit AS audit ON base.id = audit.id WHERE base.is_deleted = 0 AND api_group.group_id in (${groupIds}) </select>
ğŸ’¡ å»ºè®®ï¼š ã€IN å­å¥åŠ¨æ€å€¼ã€‘ é—®é¢˜ï¼šIN (${ids}) å­˜åœ¨ SQL æ³¨å…¥é£é™© æ­£ç¡®æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼šä½¿ç”¨ <foreach> æ ‡ç­¾ ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š<foreach collection="ids" item="id" open="(" close=")" separator=","> #{id} </foreach> æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿™æ ·æ¯ä¸ªå€¼éƒ½ä¼šè¢«å‚æ•°åŒ–ï¼Œå®‰å…¨ä¸”é«˜æ•ˆ
ApiVersionMapperCustom.xml 1 ä¸ª

cn.org.bjca.footstone.gateway.dao.mapper.ApiVersionMapperCustom.getApiOwnerStats

/Users/liujinliang/workspace/project/api-gateway-manager/api-gateway-manager-server/src/main/resources/mapping/ApiVersionMapperCustom.xml:850
é«˜å± åˆ†é¡µé—®é¢˜
SELECT æŸ¥è¯¢ç¼ºå°‘ç‰©ç†åˆ†é¡µ - å¤§æ•°æ®é‡æ—¶å¯èƒ½å¯¼è‡´å†…å­˜æº¢å‡ºï¼ˆé€»è¾‘åˆ†é¡µé£é™©ï¼‰

ğŸ“‹ Java æ–¹æ³•ç­¾å

List getApiOwnerStats()

ğŸ“„ XML è¯­å¥

<select id="getApiOwnerStats" resultMap="OwnerStatsResultMap"> <![CDATA[ select tmp.creator_trim, tmp.status, tmp.status_count, ifnull(user.user_id, 0) as user_id from ( select trim(trailing ";" from creator) as creator_trim, status, count(1) as status_count from api_version where is_deleted = 0 group by trim(";" from creator), status ) as tmp left join user on tmp.creator_trim = user.rtx ]]> </select>
ğŸ’¡ å»ºè®®ï¼š å»ºè®®ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ç‰©ç†åˆ†é¡µæœºåˆ¶ - LIMIT å­å¥ã€RowBounds å‚æ•°ã€PageHelper æˆ– MyBatis-Plus çš„ IPage/Page
